---
title: Actions
---

The majority of Farcaster miniapp actions is implemented in Towns, however, the following is not implemented yet:

- `experimental.signManifest`
- `wallet.solanaProviderRequest`
- `actions.addMiniApp`
- `actions.viewCast`
- `actions.viewProfile`
- `actions.viewToken`
- `actions.sendToken`
- `actions.swapToken`
- `actions.openMiniApp`
- `actions.requestCameraAndMicrophoneAccess`

For the full list of supported actions, see the [Farcaster SDK documentation](https://miniapps.farcaster.xyz/docs/sdk/actions).
